meanings.definition: Silly or ridiculous in a playful or amusing way.
meanings.sent1: The clown's outfit looked even goofier under the bright circus lights.
meanings.sent2: Her jokes became goofier as the party went on.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's attempt to chase its tail was even goofier than before.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a penguin wearing a top hat seemed goofier than a flying elephant.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter filled the room as they watched the goofier cartoon characters on TV.

meanings.definition: Acting in a foolish or clumsy manner.
meanings.sent1: His goofier dance moves always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: She felt goofier than usual after tripping over her own shoelaces.
meanings.sent3: The goofier attempts to fix the broken vase only made it worse.
meanings.sent4: The cat's attempt to catch the laser pointer was goofier than a fish trying to climb a tree.
meanings.sent5: The goofier behavior of the class clown often landed him in detention.
